law.text: Whoever violates any provision of sections thirty-three and thirty-five shall be punished for a first offence by a fine of not more than thirty dollars, for the second offence by a fine of not more than seventy-five dollars, and for a subsequent offence by a fine of not more than one hundred and fifty dollars. Whoever violates any provisions of sections thirty-six B and thirty-six C shall be punished for a first offense by a fine of not more than two thousand dollars, for a second offense by a fine of not more than five thousand dollars and for a subsequent offense by a fine of not more than ten thousand dollars.
